original_title: How Thermal Post-Curing Resin Prints Affects Their Strength
original_content:
Credit: CNC Kitchen
Resin 3D prints have a reputation for being brittle, but [Stefan] over at [CNC Kitchen] would like to dispel this myth with the thing which we all love: colorful bar graphs backed up by scientifically appropriate experiments. As he rightfully points out, the average resin printer user will just cure a print by putting it in the sunshine or in a curing station that rotates the part in front of some UV lights. This theoretically should cause these photosensitive resins to fully cure, but as the referenced Formlabs documentation and their Form Cure station indicate, theres definitely a thermal element to it as well.
To test the impact of temperature during the UV curing process, the test parts were put into an oven along with the UV lamp. Following this uncured, ambient cured and parts cured at 40 to 80 ºC were exposed to both tensile strength tests as well as impact strength. The best results came from the Siraya Tech Blu resin cured at 80 ºC, with it even giving FDM-printed parts a run for their money, as the following graphs make clear. This shows the value of thermal post-curing, as it anneals the resin prints. This reduces their impact strength somewhat, but massively improves their tensile strength.

An interesting data point is also that not only does thermal post-curing work during the exposure to the UV source, but also afterwards, even if you lose a few points in the tensile strength test. Although these results are just for this one type of resin, its possible that heating the resin prints while UV curing may universally benefit resin prints. This would surely make for a fascinating follow-up study.
Credit: CNC Kitchen
Credit: CNC Kitchen
title: UV硬化プリントの耐久性を高める方法の研究結果
body: [Stefan]さんが、樹脂3Dプリントが壊れやすいというイメージを払拭しようと、カラフルなバーグラフと科学的な実験を行いました。熱後硬化が樹脂プリントの強度を向上させることを示した研究結果は興味深い。
titles: UV硬化プリントの耐久性を高める方法の研究結果
熱後硬化がレジンプリントの物理特性に与える影響
サイエンスに基づくカラフルなバーグラフで解き明かすレジンプリントの性質
レジンプリントにおける熱後硬化の重要性と効果
UV光源下でのヒーター加熱がレジンプリントに及ぼす影響の検証
